name: StopPoint_GetByMode
description: Gets a list of StopPoints filtered by the modes available at that StopPoint.

modes.description: A comma-seperated list of modes e.g. tube,dlr

page.description: The data set page to return. Page 1 equates to the first 1000 stop points, page 2 equates to 1001-2000 etc. Must be entered for bus mode as data set is too large.

$ul: **centrePoint**: The centre latitude/longitude of this list of StopPoints
**pageSize**: The maximum size of the page in this response i.e. the maximum number of StopPoints
**total**: The total number of StopPoints available across all pages
